title: A Secret Love
description:
Tig and Cheryl's (platonic) love for each other is entirely public, but today's doc, "A Secret Love," is a whole other story! The doc chronicles a 70-year lesbian relationship, and discussing it leads to one of the most hilarious, candid episodes of "True Story" to date. You won't want to miss it! *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
